snippet: RUBEN--Lawrence. The Membership and Board of Governors of the Boca Rio Golf Club, Boca Raton, Florida announce with deep regret and sorrow the passing of our member Lawrence Ruben, July 3, 2016 and extend our sincerest condolences to his wife Jan ...
lead_paragraph: RUBEN--Lawrence. The Membership and Board of Governors of the Boca Rio Golf Club, Boca Raton, Florida announce with deep regret and sorrow the passing of our member Lawrence Ruben, July 3, 2016 and extend our sincerest condolences to his wife Jan and their family. David Beckerman President Boca Rio Golf Club, Inc. 1/3
